v1.headline: Mechanical Engineer specializing in Automotive Product Design | Content Creator and Founder of Wordsmith OU | Helping Businesses through the Power of Content
v1.about:
Hi, I'm Manan. 

I am a mechanical engineer with 10 years of experience in automotive and design engineering, and a content creator on LinkedIn.

I also have a YouTube channel where I share the insights on life in Estonia. 

Apart from these things, I have always liked writing. It has been an excellent method of expression for me. 

Little did I know that writing on LinkedIn pays back in the form of revenue, leads and brand awareness.   

So I actively started offering my writing services on LinkedIn when I lost my job in December 2022. 

Till this date, I've worked with more than 25 companies, and helped 200+ professionals create their profiles on LinkedIn. 

I believe this is just the beginning of my journey on LinkedIn. 

Connect with me if you want me to set up your LinkedIn profile, or write content for you/your business.
